ui_metadata.display_name: CIS Ubuntu Linux 24.04 LTS v1.0.0 L1 Server

variables.name: PLATFORM_VERSION
variables.info: Ubuntu Version

variables.name: BANNER_TEXT
variables.default: All activities performed on this system will be monitored.
variables.info: This is the text for the warning a user receives when logging onto the system.

variables.name: FIND_TIMEOUT
variables.description: Timeout for checks that search for files
variables.info: Timeout, in seconds, for checks that search for files. Range of 1-7200.

variables.name: PASSWORD_LOCKOUT
variables.info: Number of failed logon attempts before the account is locked found in faillock.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_UNLOCK_TIME
variables.description: Time before the account is unlocked
variables.info: Time in seconds before the account is unlocked found in faillock.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_DIFOK
variables.description: Password characters that must be changed.
variables.info: The number of characters in a password that must not be present in the old password.

variables.name: PASSWORD_MINIMUM_LENGTH
variables.info: Password Minimum Length found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf /etc/security/pwquality.conf.d/*.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_MINCLASS
variables.info: Password complexity value found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_OCREDIT
variables.info: Password symbols value found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_UCREDIT
variables.info: Password uppercase characters found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_LCREDIT
variables.info: Password lowercase characters found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_DCREDIT
variables.info: Password digits value found in /etc/security/pwquality.conf

variables.name: PASSWORD_MAXREPEAT
variables.info: The maximum number of allowed same consecutive characters in a new password.

variables.name: PASSWORD_MAXSEQUENCE
variables.info: The maximum length of monotonic character sequences in the new password.

variables.name: PASSWORD_HISTORY_REMEMBER
variables.description: Number of old passwords to remember.
variables.info: The number of old passwords to remember.

variables.name: PASSWORD_ENCRYPTION
variables.info: Password encryption method found in /etc/login.defs

variables.name: PASSWORD_MAX_DAYS
variables.info: Password expiration parameter found in /etc/login.defs

variables.name: PASSWORD_WARN_AGE
variables.info: Password expiration warning parameter found in /etc/login.defs

variables.name: INACTIVE_PASSWORD_LOCK
variables.info: The given period of time a user can be inactive before account is locked

variables.name: BANNER_GDM_KEYFILE
variables.description: Filename used to configure banner text
variables.info: This is the filename associated with the banner text configuration located in the /etc/dconf/db/gdm.d directory. 1.7.2

variables.name: NFTABLES_RULES_FILE
variables.info: The location of the nftables permanent rules file

variables.name: SSH_BANNER_FILE
variables.info: The path to the SSH banner file as found in sshd_config.
